About Me

Let me tell you a few things about myself.

BIO

My name is Kevin Wilmot. I am a highly motivated learner who is passionate about about technology and problem-solving. I graduated from the University of Denver with a Bachelor's of Science in Electrical Engineering in 2016 and found myself working for a software company soon afterwards. I started out in quality assurance, studying not just how software works, but why. From there, I worked my way up to a web developer and have been happily coding since.
